Name: Rose No.3
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of redcurrants, edible rose petal or Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Delicate, aromatic berry and orchard fruit - not too sweet.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Rose No.3 contains 125 calories
